product_overview: BizDrive Manager is a web-based vehicle fleet management application designed to streamline vehicle driving logs, reservations, fueling and maintenance tracking, parking spot management, and admin oversight with user management and analytical dashboards. It supports both PC and mobile platforms with focus on usability and responsive design.
core_goals: Provide an efficient interface for managing vehicle driving logs including add, edit, delete, filter and export functionalities.
Enable vehicle reservation management via a calendar view for easy scheduling.
Track vehicle fueling and maintenance events to optimize fleet upkeep.
Manage parking spots efficiently within the platform.
Offer an admin dashboard with comprehensive statistics for operational insights.
Support user management for access control and administration.
Ensure seamless experience across desktop and mobile devices with responsive design.
key_features: Vehicle Driving Logs Management: CRUD operations with filtering and CSV export (UTF-8 BOM) support to manage driving records.
Vehicle Reservations: Calendar-based view and management to facilitate booking and avoiding conflicts.
Fueling and Maintenance Tracking: Log and monitor fueling and maintenance activities, with emphasis on usable forms and reminders.
Parking Spot Management: Allocation and oversight of parking spots assigned to vehicles or users.
Admin Dashboard: Visual statistics overview providing insights into vehicle usage, maintenance, fuel consumption, and more.
User Management: Administrative tools to manage user accounts and roles within the system.
Mobile Responsive UI: Adapt interface elements, buttons, input controls for optimal usability on mobile screens with consideration for tap target sizes and input focus behavior.
Robust PC UI Features: Includes hover effects, contextual menus, autocomplete inputs, and shortcut key supports such as ESC key to dismiss modals or lists.
user_flow_summary: User logs into the system and accesses the vehicle driving logs interface to add, edit, or filter logs as needed.
User navigates to the vehicle reservations section to view or make new bookings on a calendar interface.
Users enter fueling or maintenance information through guided forms that support quick data entry and validations.
Administrators monitor parking spot assignments and manage allocation changes.
Admin users review statistical dashboards to analyze fleet operations and user performance.
User management tasks including adding, editing, or removing users are performed through dedicated UI workflows.
On mobile, users interact with simplified, touch-friendly UI elements including larger buttons and optimized input forms for ease of operation.
validation_criteria: Verify hydration without mismatches to ensure React SSR hydration issues are avoided, especially for random or date-based UI parts.
Ensure all CRUD operations for driving logs are fully functional and accurate with proper data persistence.
Validate calendar booking features correctly block conflicting reservations and reflect accurate dates.
Confirm CSV export files include UTF-8 BOM for compatibility and data integrity.
Test UI responsiveness on both desktop and mobile devices including tap target sizes and input focus management.
Validate autocomplete and datalist input controls function correctly with keyboard support (Enter to confirm, ESC to cancel).
Conduct accessibility checks for hover states, context menus, and keyboard shortcuts (such as ESC key).
Check that all forms, especially maintenance and fueling logs, are user-friendly, with appropriate default focus and error handling.
Perform usability testing for both PC and mobile interactions ensuring no critical UX blockers remain.
Ensure admin dashboard statistics reflect real-time and accurate metrics of fleet usage and user actions.

features: Vehicle Driving Logs (Add, Edit, Delete, Filter, Export)
